com.cmput301.recipebot.ui.adapters

Class EditableImagePagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • com.cmput301.recipebot.ui.adapters.ImagePagerAdapter
        • com.cmput301.recipebot.ui.adapters.EditableImagePagerAdapter

  • public class EditableImagePagerAdapter
extends ImagePagerAdapter
    An extension of ImagePagerAdapter that shows two additional items. These two items add two extra buttons, an add from gallery button and add from Camera button. It is upto the hostigin activity or fragment to provide a callback for these buttons, and their behaviour is tied to however it is defined by the host.
